fields.name: `@GerpBot raffle [everyone|here|<@role>] [<number of winners>]`
fields.value: Randomly selects users from given category.

fields.name: `@GerpBot rng <number>[..<number>] [<amount>]`
fields.value: Get a random number (or numbers). Smallest and biggest number as imputs. If only one number is given the other will be 0.

fields.name: `@GerpBot echo <message>...`
fields.value: GerpBot responds with argument determined message. This command will have **no** issues.

fields.name: `@GerpBot uptime startUp | connection | lastCommand`
fields.value: Get uptime since a specific event.

fields.name: `@GerpBot ask <question>`
fields.value: Ask anything! Even works without the `ask` -part, if `?` is used instead: `@GerpBot [<question>]... ? [<question>]...`.

fields.name: `@GerpBot vote [gold <user>] <emoji1>[=<option1>]...`
fields.value: Starts a vote. A really cool one.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps play | ai | friend <name> | rock | paper | scissors | classic | horror | space | hand | quit`
`@GerpBot remind [<#channel>|<@mention>] (([<amount>](ms|s|min|h|d|y))...|[<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>T]<HH>:<MM>[:<SS>]) [<message>]...`
fields.value: Reminds after a specific amount of time or at a specific time. Can be sent to another channel or person (PM). A message can also be displayed.

fields.name: `@GerpBot remind list | (cancel <number>)`
fields.value: Gives you a list of your reminders or cancel one of your reminders.

fields.name: `@GerpBot timezone +<HH>:<MM> | -<HH>:<MM>`
fields.value: Set your timezone for the bot.

fields.name: `@GerpBot autoCompliment sample | on | off | add <@mention> | remove <@mention> | list`
